FILE: cm230232v11.0.txt
DYAD: Spain - Andorra

PS: 19930728-20209999 .75

PS-UPDATE2020:

PSNOTES: Andorra's 1993 constitution establishes the country as a sovereign parliamentary democracy and retains as heads of state two co-princes -- the Bishop of Urgell (Spain) and the French president.

PS-Source:https://www.state.gov/r/pa/ei/bgn/3164.htm

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20220223
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20220223
